27.eng-name: Chapters on Righteousness And Maintaining Good Relations With Relatives
27.ara-name: كتاب البر والصلة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abudullah bin 'Amr narrated that the Messenger of Allah said:"No supplication is more readily responded to, than the supplication made for someone who is absent

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي دَعْوَةِ الأَخِ لأَخِيهِ بِظَهْرِ الْغَيْبِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About A Brother Supplicating For His Brother In His Absence
